isis.stitle: ELECTRICAL SYSTEM TROUBLESHOOTING GUIDE - 9800 - IC BUS SERVICE MANUAL - MIRRORS - Inside Rear View Mirror

svcsubproc.title: Description
svcsubproc.para: The inside rear view mirror is located on the front bulkhead above the driver. The mirror addressed in this section is the standard mirror application. The mirror is 6" x 30" mounted in an all-metal case. The sun visor is mounted in the same general area as the mirror. The mirror and sun visor may be adjusted to a position that is suitable to each driver.

svcsubproc.title: Maintenance
svcsubproc.para: All mounting and assembly hardware should be inspected every 30 days. Each driver should inspect the rear view glass surface on a regular basis for glass fractures and breakage. It is not uncommon for glass to fracture under high stress conditions when mounting hardware has not been maintained. When glass fractures occur, the glass should be replaced immediately.

svcsubproc.title: Glass Replacement
svcsubproc.para: To replace the inside rear view mirror glass, use the following procedure.

step1.para: Remove the mounting hardware that attaches the inside rear view mirror mounting to the bulkhead to remove the mirror assembly ( Figure 81).
Remove the nuts and bolts on the mirror to release the adapter bracket ( Figure 82).
Remove the adapter bracket, the rubber strip and the metal backing plate ( Figure 83).

figure.caption: Figure 82. Remove Metal Strip and Backing Plate

step1.para: Remove the mirror glass and discard.
Prior to the installation of replacement glass, the glass should be inspected for small chips. If chips are found, do not install.
The inside rear view mirror should be carefully assembled by the reverse of the method required to disassemble.

warning.para: Always use safety equipment and eye protection when removing or working with glass.
